div.p: THINK ABOUT A COMPLEX ENDURING INTEND:intention
1. The current general word for a planning process involving consultation among several people, and taking into account all aspects of a long term strategy for an individual or a state is móu 謀.
2. Lu �慮 refers to a careful personal planning effort based on serious reflection.
3. Tú 圖 suggests that the person who plans has the formal authority to take a decision.
4. Jì 計 refers to planning involving calculations of relative advantages and disadvantages, and the planning typically or primarily concerns the actions of an individual.
5. Guī 規 suggests that the planning is in order to ensure an orderly progress of things.
6. Huà 畫 refers to an elaborated strategy that is fairly well-defined.
7. Xīn 心 refers to a secret motivation or ultimate design, an aim in planning. See INTENTION
下策 refers specifically to an ill-conceived plan or strategy.
rough draft to BEGIN TO identify synonym group members for analysis, based on CL etc. 18.11.2003. CH ／

note.p: 1. These are interchangeable only when they mean "plan, scheme", or when they mean "method".？？？？？

bibl.title: A New Dictionary of Classical Greek Synonyms

Bibliographisches Handbuch zur Sprachinhaltsforschung. Teil II. Systematischer Teil. B. Ordnung nach Sinnbezirken (mit einem alphabetischen Begriffsschluessel): Der Mensch und seine Welt im Spiegel der Sprachforschung

entry.def: Tú 圖 suggests that the person who plans has the formal authority to take a decision.

sense.def: have plans to V, plan to V
make plans against, plot against (e.g. the state)
be plotted against; have plans made against one
make plans for (oneself), plan in (one's own) interest
make precise plans; assess the situation

entry.def: Xīn 心 refers to a secret motivation or ultimate design, an aim in planning. See INTENTION
Lǜ 慮 refers to a careful personal planning effort based on serious reflection.

sense.def: plans for N, tactics for N

thoughts about the future, tactics BUDDH: negatively: the engaging in (inappropriate or unnecessary, or in any case nonrecommended) deliberate mental activities and inappropriate emotional responses (see WORRY)
think about the future; make plans
plot; plan for; engage in deliberations (about something forthcoming)
one's strategic thinking, someone's strategic thinking
make plans to V; be ready to V
set out to plan for and write
make plans for, make arrangements for
cause to plot against each other
cause N1 to plot against N2, sow discord between N1 and N2
tactics; strategic undertakings; tactical purpose, tactical point
aim for, plan for; be preoccupied by
go about V-ing in a planned deliberate manner

entry.def: Huà 畫 refers to an elaborated strategy that is fairly well-defined.

sense.def: calculation in planning one's action; concrete plan to be pursued
be thoughtful, be self-aware; calculate; plan

entry.def: Jīng 經 and yíng 營 focus on the the planning effort required in large-scale construction work.
Guī 規 suggests that the planning is in order to ensure an orderly progress of things.

sense.def: suggest plans, make plans; offer admonitions

entry.def: Jì 計 refers to planning involving calculations of relative advantages and disadvantages, and the planning typically or primarily concerns the actions of an individual.

sense.def: concrete calculated plan; ulterior purpose, ulterior calculated motivation; strategy
objective aimed at 得計 "achieve one's aims"
strategic thinking; precise strategic planning; planning based on calculations of profit and loss as well as likelihood of success
plan for; count on; consider plans about, calculate the advantages and disadvantages of (alternative future actions)

entry.def: The current general word for a planning process involving consultation among several people, and taking into account all aspects of a long term strategy for an individual or a state is móu 謀.

sense.def: be planned for, be consulted about
make plans; deliberate; consult with each other (and say...)
make plans; make effective plans (sometimes also with negative connotations: to scheme, See PLOT)
to discuss matters with (somebody), consult with; discuss plans for (somebody);
plan to V; make plans to V
be strategically concerned about, plan for; seek through careful planning
consult and plan with someone 與之謀
concert plans on; make plans on
make clans about S; make plans lest S
make plans for N, enter into consultations for N
consult about the contextually determinate matter
make shemes over; make plans about

entry.def: plans about what is distant/far in the future

sense.def: (the art of) strategic planning in accordance with circumstances; plans of all kinds
overall plan covering the beginning and end of an undertaking, overall strategy
plans of (personalised) Heaven; ideas of Heaven
plans/ideas of heaven construed as having desires etc.
